main event: Observers sighted two flashing lights near Fairborn, Ohio, on August 19, 1969.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 1 1/2 hours., The lights gradually got lower before disappearing on the horizon., The witnesses included boys camping approximately 10 miles away from the sighting location., The lights were described as bright and pulsating., The witnesses initially thought they saw one object that later appeared as two distinct lights.
